body:
Hi!

I am looking for a way to test building envelope to examine Daylight Autonomy with Honeybe Run Daylight Simulation component. Is it possible to introduce context geometry as a shading to observe it's impact on the analysis result? When I connect it to HbRDS's _HBObjects input as a HBSrf it sarts to calcuale, but takes forever.

Can anybody help with the problem?

Regards

Karol
topic: Context as a shading in Honeybe Run Daylight Simulation.
